title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When the 'Ok' button is pressed after setting the output location, the user receives the error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue here is that setting the output location and the classpath are two separate operations, which results in an illegal state when the output location is set.
SR:
1. Open the project and go to the settings menu.
2. Locate the 'Output location' field and set the desired location.
3. Set the classpath to the appropriate value.
4. Press the 'Ok' button to save the changes.
5. Verify that there are no error messages or illegal states related to the output location and classpath.
